---
categories:
  - HTML
tags:
  - ‹hr›
date:
  - 2020-6-2 11:07:11
---

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
    <li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&lt;hr&gt;
            </span></span><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">元素表示段落级元素之间的主题转换</span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
    <li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">在</span></span><span
            style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> HTML </span></span><span
            style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">的早期版本中，它是一个水平线。现在它仍能在可视化浏览器中表现为水平线，但目前被定义为语义上的，而不是表现层面上</span></span>
    </li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;"><span
                style="color:#6da845"><strong>实例</strong></span></span></span></p>
<table summary="" cellspacing="0"
    style="border-collapse:collapse; border-color:#a3a3a3; border-style:solid; border-width:0px; margin-left:32px; "
    class=" cke_show_border">
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td
                style="background-color:white; border-bottom:0px; border-left:0px; border-right:0px; border-top:0px; vertical-align:top; width:5.9645in">
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;!DOCTYPE</span>&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">html&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;html</span>&nbsp;<span style="color:blue">lang</span><span
                                style="color:black">=</span><span style="color:maroon">"en"</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;head&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;meta</span>&nbsp;<span style="color:blue">charset</span><span
                                style="color:black">=</span><span style="color:maroon">"UTF-8"</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;meta</span>&nbsp;<span style="color:blue">http-equiv</span><span
                                style="color:black">=</span><span
                                style="color:maroon">"X-UA-Compatible"</span>&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">content</span><span style="color:black">=</span><span
                                style="color:maroon">"IE=edge"</span><span style="color:blue">&gt;</span></span></span>
                </p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;meta</span>&nbsp;<span style="color:blue">name</span><span
                                style="color:black">=</span><span style="color:maroon">"viewport"</span>&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">content</span><span style="color:black">=</span><span
                                style="color:maroon">"width=device-width,&nbsp;initial-scale=1.0"</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;title&gt;</span><span style="color:black">test</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/title&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/head&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;body&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;p&gt;</span><span
                                style="color:black">This&nbsp;is&nbsp;the&nbsp;first&nbsp;paragraph&nbsp;of&nbsp;text.</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/p&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;hr&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;p&gt;</span><span
                                style="color:black">This&nbsp;is&nbsp;the&nbsp;second&nbsp;paragraph&nbsp;of&nbsp;text.</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/p&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/body&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/html&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&nbsp;</span></span></span></p>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
